hero.headline: Create Engaging and Effective
hero.subheadline: Help Children Fall in Love with Learning
hero.description: Stop forcing kids to memorize through painful drills! Wonderix combines neuroscience, AI, and game design to create truly engaging educational games where learning IS the gameplay—not just quizzes with rewards.

features.title: Three Pillars That Make Children
features.subtitle: Based on neuroscience, cognitive psychology, and educational research—delivering proven results.

intrinsicIntegration.title: True Gamification
intrinsicIntegration.subtitle: Intrinsic Integration
intrinsicIntegration.description: Learning is deeply integrated into gameplay, not just tests with rewards. Knowledge becomes game rules—kids must use what they learn to progress. Driven by intrinsic motivation for 7x more active learning time.

aiTutoring.title: AI Real-Time Tutoring
aiTutoring.subtitle: Intelligent Tutoring System
aiTutoring.description: AI tutors available 24/7, never tired. Precisely diagnose learning gaps, provide personalized hints at critical moments, and adapt difficulty—helping kids overcome challenges independently.

parentDashboard.title: Parent Dashboard
parentDashboard.subtitle: Transparent Progress Tracking
parentDashboard.description: Monitor learning progress transparently with visualized capability growth charts. Actionable insights help you understand your child's development and provide specific guidance to support their learning journey.

howItWorks.title: How We
howItWorks.subtitle: Backed by rigorous educational science—not just fun, but effective.

describe.title: Learning Content = Game Rules
describe.description: Knowledge is internalized as core game mechanics. Players must apply what they learn to progress—this is true gamification, not superficial rewards.

aiCreates.title: Instant Feedback & Guidance
aiCreates.description: AI identifies learning paths, progress, and challenges in real-time. Personalized hints and adaptive difficulty help kids persist without giving up or feeling bored.

sharePlay.title: Foster Intrinsic Motivation
sharePlay.description: Multiple pathways to competence, personalization for relatedness, and player control for autonomy—satisfying psychological needs leads to sustained learning motivation.

footer.tagline: Building the future of educational technology. Wonderix is our flagship product that makes game-based learning accessible to everyone.

about.title: About Wonderix
about.subtitle: We're on a mission to democratize educational game creation through artificial intelligence

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: At Wonderix, we believe every educator should have the power to create engaging, personalized learning experiences without technical barriers. Our flagship product, Wonderix, transforms the way educational games are created by enabling teachers and parents to build interactive learning tools through simple conversation.
mission.impact: We're not just building technology; we're building a future where quality education is accessible, engaging, and tailored to every learner's needs.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.content: Pushing the boundaries of AI to make educational content creation intuitive and powerful.

accessibility.title: Accessibility
accessibility.content: Ensuring every educator, regardless of technical expertise, can create amazing learning experiences.

impact.title: Impact
impact.content: Measuring our success by the positive change we bring to education worldwide.

team.title: Our Team
team.content: Wonderix was founded by Bruce, a technical founder and father who cares deeply about education. Bruce has spent the past decade building cutting-edge AI applications across various industries.
team.personal: As a parent, Bruce understands the challenges educators and families face in keeping children engaged and learning. This personal connection drives his commitment to making educational technology that truly works.
team.expertise: Wonderix is backed by a network of experienced educators who serve as consultants, ensuring that the platform meets the real needs of teachers and parents. Their invaluable insights help bridge the gap between advanced AI technology and practical classroom applications.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.quote: "A world where every educator is empowered to create engaging, personalized learning experiences that inspire and educate the next generation."

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.content: We'd love to hear from you. Whether you're an educator, investor, or just curious about what we're building.

founders.title: Meet the Founder
founders.subtitle: A father on a mission to make learning magical through AI-powered games

bruce.bio: Bruce brings over a decade of experience in machine learning and AI product development, having led innovative products across semiconductor, digital reading platforms, healthcare information systems, and live streaming applications. As a father of two, Bruce understands firsthand how children thrive when learning is fun and engaging. This insight drives his mission to revolutionize educational gaming through AI-powered tools.
